Notice:

Water Bills are due by the 10th of each month.  If you did not receive your bill, call City Hall at 979-793-4253 to get your bill amount.     |     View the [2025 Hurricane Preparedness Guide](https://www.cityofneedville.com/news/2025-hurricane-preparedness-guide)
for the Houston-Galveston Region.     |     Water Bills are due by the 10th of each month.  If you did not receive your bill, call City Hall at 979-793-4253 to get your bill amount.     |     View the [2025 Hurricane Preparedness Guide](https://www.cityofneedville.com/news/2025-hurricane-preparedness-guide)
for the Houston-Galveston Region.

City Services

Utility Information
===================

City Utilities

---

For information about City Services and Utilities:

Contact Iris Walker at 
[(979) 793-4253](tel:979-793-4253) 
or by email at 
[iriswalker@cityofneedville.com](mailto:iriswalker@cityofneedville.com) 
Monday - Friday, 9:00 AM - 5:00 PM

Below are important dates and information about your utilities:

* When are Utility Bills Due?
  ---------------------------

  Utility bills are due on the **10th of each month.**

    

  There is a 10% late fee after the 10th. Even if the 10th is a weekend, the water bills are still due and must be in the office **BEFORE 9AM**on the next Business day.

    

  There is a drop box in the front of the building and you do have the option to pay online.
* When is the Utility Bill Cutoff Date?
  -------------------------------------

  The utility bill cutoff date is the **20th of each month.**

    

  ALL UNPAID UTILITIES WILL BE CUTOFF WITHOUT FURTHER NOTICE.

    

  Delinquent accounts listed on the cutoff list will be charged $50.00 whether cutoff or not.

    

  Payments after the 20th can be paid at city hall or online.

    

  When paying online, you MUST click other and enter the FULL amount you owe before services will be turned back on.
* Can I Pay My Utility Bill Online?
  ---------------------------------

  Yes!

    

  Please view our online bill pay option **[here](https://www.cityofneedville.com/online-bill-pay)**.
